subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Donald Young, 22, has spent eight years playing professional tennis, but his career has been defined by unfulfilled potential. At the first round of Wimbledon, he lost his 12th consecutive match.
snippet: Donald Young, 22, has spent eight years playing professional tennis, but his career has been defined by unfulfilled potential. At the first round of Wimbledon, he lost his 12th consecutive match.
